text: Pavle Obradović (; born 4 July 2001) is a Serbian professional footballer who plays for the U19 and B-teams of RC Strasbourg Alsace. ==Career statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Continental !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |Borac Čačak |2018–19 |Serbian First League ||16||0||0||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||16||0 |- !colspan="3"|Career total !16!!0!!0!!0!!colspan="2"|—!!colspan="2"|—!!16!!0 |} ==References== ==External links== Category:2001 births Category:Living people Category:Association football forwards Category:Serbian footballers Category:Serbian expatriate footballers Category:FK Borac Čačak players Category:RC Strasbourg Alsace players Category:Serbian First League players Category:Serbian expatriate sportspeople in France Category:Expatriate footballers in France
title: Pavle Obradović
